Shopping Cart

Name Price Supplier Quantity
{{ cart.product.name }} {{ cart.product.price}} {{ cart.product.supplier.name }} {{cart.quantity}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {ProductService} from "../product.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-shopping-cart', templateUrl: './shopping-cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./shopping-cart.component.scss'], }) export class ShoppingCartComponent { constructor(private productService: ProductService) { } populateCart = this.productService.getShoppingCartPopulated(); }
